prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body character design, a young man with an ethereal and divine beauty, standing centered on a pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich light and shadow variations and visible brushstrokes. His face is exquisitely sculpted, with delicate and harmonious features: high cheekbones, a straight and elegant nose, and a well-defined jawline. His skin is pale and luminous, as if infused with moonlight, flawless and smooth. His eyes are large, almond-shaped, and captivating, with irises that shift in color like liquid moonlight—silver, pale blue, and lavender—holding profound wisdom and gentle empathy. His eyebrows are finely arched, his lips are full and softly curved in a serene, compassionate expression. His hair is long, flowing past his shoulders, in a silvery-white hue with subtle streaks of pale blue and lavender, as if woven from moonlight itself, styled in soft, natural waves that frame his face. He wears elegant, layered fantasy attire: a high-collared, long-sleeved inner robe of sheer, silvery fabric that shimmers, over which is a slightly translucent, open-front coat in shades of pale blue and lavender, adorned with delicate, intricate silver embroidery resembling celestial patterns and crescent moons. The fabrics are light and flowing, suggesting silk and gossamer, moving with a graceful drape. His physique is slender yet toned, suggesting both agility and strength, with an overall aura of serene intelligence, immense charm, and divine grace. The atmosphere is dreamy, poetic, and mystical, fitting the game's theme of moonlit fantasy. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

back.prompt:
Generate a full-body, back-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. No facial features should be visible.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

side.prompt:
Generate a full-body, side-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Facing left. Standing with arms relaxed at sides.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
